abilities.name: Gilded Imprints
abilities.details: Everett's basic attacks, Sunfire Volley and Brilliant Rain embed Golden Needles on the target that stacks infinitely. Killing the enemy target will return all the Golden Needles back to him, earning him bonus gold depending on the number of returned needles.

abilities.name: Sunfire Volley
abilities.details:
Everett throws 3 needles in a target direction, each dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

When shielded, the needle can pierce through all enemies in its path, dealing the same damage to all targets.

abilities.name: Golden Ward
abilities.details:
Everett places a Golden Ward at a target location, granting vision in a small area for a duration. While Everett is within range of a Golden Ward, his basic attacks apply an additional Golden Needle stack.

When shielded, Everett gains increased attack speed while within range of a Golden Ward.

abilities.name: Auric Thread
abilities.details:
Everett pulls back all the Golden Needles, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) based on the number of needles pulled back.

When shielded, the damage is increased based on Everett's critical strike chance.

If an enemy is killed by this ability, Gilded Imprints will still be triggered, earning Everett bonus gold based on the number of needles pulled back.

abilities.name: Brilliant Rain
abilities.details:
Everett unleashes a torrent of neeldes for a short duration, reducing his movement speed but rapidly throwing needles at nearby enemies, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) with each needle.

Each needle thrown is treated like a basic attack and can critically strike.
